name: Vr Roller Coaster Simulator Rush
description:
Vr Crazy Roller coaster adventure is ready for you , lets make a craziest ride towards sky in the starting of new year 2017.
Let’s raise your adrenaline with space roller coaster and get a real navigation of virtual reality by using your cardboard glasses to get an extreme fun of roller coaster rush.
Space roller coaster skater will take you high, left skyline behind and give you a real navigation of space around you. So lets get this crazy journey today to explore featuring dimensions with virtual reality effects.
Features:
360 degree rotation of virtual reality.
Wear cardboard to explore real virtual journey.
Take ride in open space to grab real fun.
Real crazy and speedy rides.
Loads of riding modes available.
